  physical_appearance: This is an armband worn by Japanese soldier in Changi Prisoners of War camp. It is rectangular in shape
 and has a Kanji inscription in the center
 with a \u0027No. 50\u0027 below it. The cloth is slightly stained especially along the folds and the edges.
